tasks.label: Deploy Bicep
tasks.command: az deployment group create --resource-group ${input:resourceGroup} --template-file main.bicep --name deploy --parameters storageAccountName=${input:storageAccountName}

tasks.label: Upload index.html
tasks.command: az storage blob upload --auth-mode login --account-name ${input:storageAccountName} --container-name '$web' --name index.html --file index.html --overwrite true --content-type text/html

inputs.description: Enter the Storage Account Name (globally unique)
